thread.title: Excellent hotel would return!
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel would return! - Review of Royal Garden Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: hs951
title: Excellent hotel would return!
text: This hotel is based right on the edge of Hyde Park, it's within easy distance of underground station and moments walk from the great shooing of South Kensington. You can walk to many of Londons museums within 30 mins as well. The hotel it's self is well appointed, reception very friendly. Rooms are cosy but functional. Bed good, bathroom very clean. Breakfast was very nice excellent choice of hot and cold selection. Overall will definably return to this hotel!
